edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame

Class BattleshipWindowAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener.WindowAdapter
      • edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.BattleshipGame.BattleshipWindowAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener.WindowListener

    public class BattleshipWindowAdapter
extends com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener.WindowAdapter
    Extends lanterna's WindowAdapter, which itself is an abstract class implementing the WindowListener interface. Handles keyboard interactions from the user.
    Version:
    1.0, April 2014
    Author:
    Twitch Plays Battleship Group

      • onUnhandledKeyboardInteraction

        public void onUnhandledKeyboardInteraction(com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window window,
                                  com.googlecode.lanterna.input.Key key)
        Handle keyboard interaction on the window. Accesses parent window's focusedBox instance variable to send input to client. Also accesses focused BattleshipSquare's row and column variables.
        Specified by:
        onUnhandledKeyboardInteraction in interface com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener.WindowListener
        Overrides:
        onUnhandledKeyboardInteraction in class com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener.WindowAdapter

      • onFocusChanged

        public void onFocusChanged(com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window window,
                  com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Interactable fromComponent,
                  com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Interactable toComponent)
        Update parent window's focusedBox instance variable when focus is changed. focusedBox is used in onUnhandledKeyboardInteraction above.
        Specified by:
        onFocusChanged in interface com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener.WindowListener
        Overrides:
        onFocusChanged in class com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.listener.WindowAdapter
